author: Sinéad Crowley
title: U2 contributes €10m for PPE to help combat virus
description: Irish rock band U2 is contributing €10m for the sourcing and purchase of PPE and other supports to help combat Covid-19 in Ireland, and support frontline healthcare workers.
content:
Irish rock band U2 is contributing €10 million for the sourcing and purchase of personal protective equipment (PPE) and other supports to help combat Covid-19 in Ireland, and support frontline healthcare workers.
The first part of the shipment arrived yester… [+2313 chars]
